data: Excellent! You have completed all the Yakuza jobs!
Congratulations! You completed all the Zaibatsu jobs!
Hoo-hoo! You completed all the Loony jobs!
No one betrays the mighty Yakuza. Loyal assassins are the future, Kosai. As a reward I give you $40,000.
I like your style, Gecko! Such professionalism in the face of adversity deserves to receive $40,000.
Erradicating these childish threats is a constant problem, Gecko. But now you are richer by $40,000.
Impressive, Gecko! This display of force will remind the Cops not to bite the Zaibatsu hand that feeds them. Your fine performance is worthy of $40,000.
Ooh, Jumbo! I just LOVE this new Dementia Limousine! Here's $40,000 for being so thoughtful.
Excellent, Kosai! Now bring the car back to the Safehouse.
Drive to Yakuza territory and you will be safe, Kosai!
I told you to use a Z-Type.
I told you to use a Miara.
You are useless!
You have been arrested!
ALL YAKUZA JOBS DONE!
ALL LOONY JOBS DONE!
ALL ZAIBATSU JOBS DONE!

You need more respect to work for the Yakuza!
This is Yakuza territory. You are advised to kill some Zaibatsu before you return for work.
You have already accepted a Yakuza job. Return when it is over!
The Yakuza have no respect for you! Disappear!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1095 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
The Yakuza do not do business with Loonies. Get lost!
The Yakuza do not do business with Zaibatsu whores. Begone!
Fool! You have already finished this Yakuza job!
Idiot! You already messed up this Yakuza job!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1100 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Hoo-hoo! Ha-ha! You need more respect to work for the Loonies!
Welcome to Loony Land! Kill Yakuza to make us happy!
Hey, stupid, are you not already on a Loo-Loo-Loony job? Come back when you are through-ooh-ooh!
Be warned! Respect the Loonies or wind up... lobotomized!
We Loonies don't like the smell of Yakuza - and you stink. Poo-poo! Poo-poo!
Respect the Loonies or wind up lobotomized!
Loonies don't make deals with those boring Zaibatsu people! So blow!
You already did this job, fruitcake!
Hey, screwball, you screwed up this Loony job already!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1110 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
You expect the Zaibatsu to respect YOU?
This is the Zaibatsu territory - home only to those who eliminate Loonies.
You are already on a Zaibatsu job. Return only when your work is done.
Disrespecting the Zaibatsu is... inadvisable.
The Zaibatsu do not negotiate with Yakuza scum. GO!
The Zaibatsu do not negotiate with Loony filth. GO!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1117 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
You are in error. This Zaibatsu job has already been completed.
You have a short memory. You already took this Zaibatsu job and made a mess of it.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1120 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Nice one, Gecko! You certainly earned your $40,000.
JOB COMPLETE!
JOB FAILED!
Hey, Gecko, it's Trey Welsh. I need some clean cash for a Cop pay-off. There's a Third World Bank Van circling the city. Steal it.
Pick up the Z-Men Unit - then I will fill you in on the job.
The Z-Men are dead men! The job's over for you, Gecko.
No Bank Van means no money. Get yourself a regular job, joker.
Hey, Gecko, the Z-Men are expecting you. Sound your horn to get their attention.
The Bank is expecting this Van - so be careful with it, Gecko!
Grab the briefcase and get the hell out of there!
Get the Bank Van and the clean cash back to the Safehouse - FAST!
Find Rollo Tomassi, life-long friend of the Zaibatsu. He can swap clean cash for the necessary Cop pay-off.
Rollo Tomassi was Zaibatsu connected, Gecko. Wasting his ass was a BAD move.
Give the package to the Cop - with our thanks!
That wasn't so smart, Gecko.
Give my regards to Trey Welsh. Remind him the price is going up.
His price just went down, Gecko. Get a vehicle and get to the Safehouse.
Get back in the Bank Van, dumb ass!
CHECKING CLEARANCE... THIRD WORLD BANK... 0-01882A... CLEARANCE... OK. HAVE A NICE DAY.
You can drink that polluted shit alone, Gecko. Goodbye.
That wasn't so smart, Gecko. The job's OFF.
Hey, wait for us!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hey, Gecko! Trey Welsh here. The Yakuza are flooding the streets with cheap merchandise. I need you to supply my dealers - FAST. Collect the new shipment and get moving!
Move swiftly, Gecko, and watch the clock! You only have THREE minutes to get this shit on the street!
Too slow, Gecko. Too slow. Did you take some of the stash?
What a mess, Gecko. I think pizza deliveries are more your style.
Faster, Gecko! Three to go and people need blow.
Dead Dealers are no use to anyone - least of all me, Gecko.
Tick tock goes the clock, two deals to go on this block.
If I wanted dead Dealers I would have hired Hitmen. Your number's up, Gecko.
Three down, one to go. Come on, Gecko - move it!
Putting dealers in bodybags wasn't your job, Gecko.
You drive like the wind, Gecko. I think we can make further use of your services. In the meantime take $20,000 for your trouble.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hi, Kosai, it's Johnny Zoo. I think my top man is selling information to the Zaibatsu. I want you to tail him.
He's dead, Kosai, and dead men can tell us nothing. This job is over.
He saw you, Kosai, and now the job is history. Learn to follow simple instructions and you might live longer.
You lost him, Kosai. In future concentrate on the job and you will not make so many mistakes.
Excellent, you found the traitor's hideout. He must suffer the Yakuza way. Make contact with the ancient torture master, Refried Noodle.
Refried Noodle was older than this city, Kosai. Consider his death a bad mistake on your part.
I am Refried Noodle. Here is a weapon - if you need it.
The traitor and his men must die! Kill them all, Kosai!
If he sees you again, Kosai, kiss this job goodbye.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1200 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Consider yourself lucky this time, Kosai. I won't always be around to pay off the Cops.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Trey Welsh here. The Loonies have slipped narcotics in the water supply and hit my drugs business. Revenge will be simple. First, you need a special Loony Dementia.
The Loony guards seem a bit twitchy. Make sure they don't spot you.
I didn't ask for a flaming Dementia, Gecko. Find yourself a new employer.
You need $5,000 to get the car rigged - so start working!
OK, Gecko, here's the plan... Take the Dementia to the Bomb Shop and rig it with explosives. Then return the rigged Dementia to the Loony Garage and blow the Loons to the Moon.
This car don't drive by ESP - so get your ass back in!
The party's over in Crazy Town, Gecko. Dump the rigged Dementia in the Loony Garage and set the explosives.
The Dementia's rigged! Get your ass back in the car and drive cool to the Loony Garage.
Don't try my patience, Gecko. Get back in the Van!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1230 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Stop wasting time, Gecko. Go get the Z-Men!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1232 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1233 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1235 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Shit like you is only fit for the sidewalk, Gecko.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hey, wait for us!
Shit, Gecko, a group of crack Loonies are on their way. You need reinforcements - and fast. Take the Van and meet the Z-Men at North-West Zarelli.
How many times do you think you can screw up?
You wrecked the Van! Back to the phones, Gecko.
You flushed the Van down the toilet! Find someone else to wipe your sorry ass, Gecko.
You can pick up no-one from a cell, Gecko. Enjoy the solitude.
Now go pick up the Z-Men.
The Z-Men will get in the Van when you blast the horn.
Z-Men! Dead! Gecko, consider this job terminated.
Excellent, Gecko, you got the Z-Men. Now head for the Loony Garage and nail that band of crazies!
Trey Welsh here. The small-time Yute gang is getting cocky, crushing our new Zaibatsu cars for scrap. I want answers. There's a snitch called Lefty by the Casino. Find out what he knows.
You killed Lefty! Find yourself a new employer and a new job.
That's Lefty! Beat the son-of-a-bitch until he tells us where his Boss is hiding. But don't kill him until he talks, Gecko!
Hey, I don't know shit. Even if I did, I wouldn't tell you or Trey Welsh.
You needed that Yute Car, Gecko! Go home and pack your bags.
Steal a Yute Car from the South Docks, Gecko - and don't take no shit.
You barbecued the Yute Boss! It's back to the phones for you, Gecko.
The anti-corrosion warranty is void, Gecko. Consider your employment terminated.
It seems someone bigger is behind the car crushing, Gecko. Bring the Yute Boss to Zaibatsu HQ and we will use electrode therapy to find out what he knows.
Settle down, tough guy! The bloke you need is relaxing at the Easy Rider Whore House.
Hey, you ain't my driver!
Sound the horn, Gecko. The dumb Yute will think his driver has come to collect him.
Good work, Gecko - you got the Yute Boss! Now bring him and the Yute Car to Zaibatsu headquarters. And make sure they both stay in one piece.
Stay in the car, Gecko, while our friend gets out to talk.
I told you to be careful, Gecko. You lost the car AND the job.
No Zaibatsu were meant to die. Take a holiday, Gecko. You are in deep shit!
We got what we wanted. Take our friend to the South Docks and show him how his Car Crusher works first-hand.
Hey, wait for me!
Back in the car, Gecko!
The South Dock Car Crusher - remember?
Get out of the car and let the crane do the work, Gecko. But don't go anywhere. Watch and learn how Zaibatsu recycle their waste.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1275 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
I told you to watch and learn, Gecko! Lose yourself. The Zaibatsu have no time for the squeamish.
Was that fun? Now move it to the Easy Rider Whore House!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hi, Kosai, it's Johnny Zoo. The Loonies still owe me money for merchandise. Get some wheels, get to the City University and GET MY DOLLARS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1282 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Sound your horn, Kosai, the Loonies are expecting you.
We can't deal with dead Loonies, Kosai. Consider this job terminated.
We ain't payin'! Die, Yakuza delivery boy!
Kill the crazies, Kosai!
Hey, dreamer, get back in the car and sound the horn.
Sound the horn, fool!
The Loonies are crazy for Mary Jane's Ice Cream. Get an Ice-Cream Van so you can access the City Asylum - then we will teach this idiot gang a lesson.
You need $5,000 to rig the Ice-Cream Van with explosives.
You need more dollars to rig the Van. Might I humbly suggest a killing spree?
You wasted the Ice-Cream Van and my time. The job's off, Kosai.
Good, you have enough dollars to arm the Ice-Cream Van. Get to it!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1294 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1295 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1296 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1297 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Drive the Ice-Cream Van to the Loony Asylum. Once you get inside destroy their Happy Gas tanks.
Get back in the Ice-Cream Van before my patience melts, Kosai.
No more Mary Jane for you, Kosai. I refuse to work with amateurs.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1301 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Arm the Ice-Cream Van bomb then escape the Asylum - fast.
Super-fantastic, Kosai! The Loonies are lost without their Happy Gas. Have $40,000 for your hard work.
Clearly you are too weak to complete even the simplest of tasks, Kosai. A pity.
Your foolishness has cost me dear, Kosai. I leave you to play with the Loonies.
I do not tolerate your close contact with the Cops, Kosai. In future keep your distance.
That was stupid, Kosai. I will pull some strings to set you free.
That is not the best way to avoid work, Kosai. Pull yourself together!
You will find it difficult to do business now that he is dead, Kosai.
JOB FAILED!
Hey, Jumbo, it's Elmo here. The Cops have a new Dementia Limousine in their Car Compound and I want it BAD. Meet my friend Dodo at the University - he will help you.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1312 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Uh-oh! Dodo's dead! I don't think I can ever forgive you, Jumbo.
Hello, Elmo's special friend. I have arranged for a gun and some bombs to be left behind the Harman Hotel. I'd like to come but it's bath night.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1315 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
The guard outside the Cop Car Compound is too nice to die. Get some wheels and meet Lance - he will distract the Guard for $1,000 a pop.
Lance is... dead, Jumbo. Find yourself a new job.
Are you serious? I ain't moving for anything less than a thousand.
You got the money - now go get Lance!
A thousand bucks! I'm all yours, big boy.
Lance! Dead! That's the job over for you, Jumbo.
Drop Lance outside the Cop Car Compound and leave the vehicle - Lance will need it.
You can't leave Lance, Jumbo!
Drive to the Cop Car Compound - and hurry, Jumbo!
Get out of the vehicle, Jumbo, and wait to see if Lance does his stuff.
I didn't say you could kill the Cop, Jumbo. Consider yourself off the job.
My dream car! Wasted! Stay away from me for a while, Jumbo.
Lance's filthy allure is working. Enter the Cop Car Compound and kill the other guard - I don't like him.
Ssh! Don't let the guard see you!
He's spotted you, Jumbo. This is going to make the job tough.
Use your Molotov Cocktails to blow up the door locks.
Take that Dementia Limousine and put your foot to the floor!
This car's hot, Jumbo, so get back in!
Okay, Jumbo, get the Limousine back to the Asylum - real cool, yeah!
Quit foolin' and drive to the Asylum - smooth, brother.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hi, Kosai, it's Johnny Zoo. The authorities have impounded my favorite car and I want you to steal me a SWAT Van as compensation.
Very cool, Kosai. Bring it to my garage.
What's taking you so long, Kosai? Where's my SWAT Van?
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1344 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1345 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1346 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1347 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1348 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1349 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
You steal well, Kosai. The Yakuza will have many jobs for someone with your talents. For now, $60,000 should see you right.
Getting arrested was incompetent, Kosai. Now you cannot work!
Your performance is pathetic, Kosai. Goodbye.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hi, Kosai, it's Johnny Zoo. Gama Rei has to leave the City Hospital - fast. He's in plastic surgery so you need a Medicar.
Excellent, Kosai. Now collect Gama Rei from the City Hospital.
What are you doing with the Medicar, Kosai? You have a job to do!
Have patience, Kosai. Gama Rei only just got his new face.
Gama Rei is dead!
The man who destroys a Medicar, Kosai, is not a well man. Such people don't get jobs.
Gama Rei must be taken to the Safehouse before the Loonies dispatch Assassins. Move it!
Gama Rei has stolen Loony secrets so they want him bad. Watch his ass, Kosai.
Get back in the Medicar, Kosai!
Deliver Gama Rei to the Safehouse NOW!
Gama Rei is important to us, Kosai. We are most pleased by your performance. Here - have $40,000.
Compensating the Cops for your mistakes is not my style, Kosai. Be warned - my temper is short.
I warned you, Kosai. You messed up and now the Cops will mess you up.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hey, wait for me!
Kosai! Johnny Zoo here! Military top brass are pissed with me and sending a Tank and Ground Troops to trash my exotic cars. I need your help.
Shit, Kosai! That Tank means business.
Fantastic, Kosai! You are my first call if the Military strike. Here's $60,000.
Your failure to stop this military offensive has cost me dear, Kosai. Be thankful I cannot touch you from here.
My beautiful cars are destroyed! Now I must take the bus, Kosai?
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1406 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1407 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1408 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
The Tank is still rolling, Kosai. Don't get arrested again.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hey, Jumbo! Elmo here. I'm bored so I'm starting a gang war. First, I want you to steal a Zaibatsu Z-Type and run down Johnny Zoo's three top Yakuza.
Nice, Jumbo! Stick with the Loonies - we always have the most fun. Here's $60,000 for you to play with.
Ooh, the Z-Type is cool, Jumbo. Now get hunting those Yakuza!
Look, Jumbo, you HAVE to use a Zaibatsu Z-Type for my plan to work.
To drive that bad takes practise. See you around, Jumbo.
Welcome to Yakuza Town, Jumbo! Happy hunting!
Get back on the Yakuza turf, Jumbo.
Hoo-hoo! I bet that hurts!
I say! That's the style!
Hey! Them bones, them bones, them broken bones!
Steal a Yakuza Miara and drive over to the Zaibatsu quarter - then run over Trey Welsh's top three Z-Lieutenants. Ha ha ha!
Look, Jumbo, you HAVE to use a Yakuza Miara for my plan to work.
Cool, Jumbo! Now it's off to the Zaibatsu quarter for some corporate killing.
The air's clean - it can only be the Zaibatsu quarter. Gentlemen, start your killin'!
I want rivers of blood in Zaibatsu streets! Get in there!
Mmm, Zaibatsu for dinner!
Zaibatsu for lunch!
And Zaibatsu between meals!
A Yakuza got away, Jumbo! That's no good! It's back to cleaning toilets for you.
A Yakuza escaped, Jumbo, so you be the bitch with no job.
A Yakuza escaped, Jumbo - and I thought I was the stupid one.
A Zaibatsu escaped, Jumbo. Get back to your mummy.
A Zaibatsu got away! You screwed up, Jumbo. Get back behind the bar.
A Zaibatsu escaped, Jumbo. You know - I don't like you any more.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Hey, Jumbo! You should meet Cosmo Trouble, Downtown. He's got a bonkers mad job for you!
Jumbo, it's me, Elmo. That call was a hoax. Your ass has been set up by my bonkers mad brother who's sent three serious hitmen after you. You'd better kill them - quick!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1465 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Nicely done, Jumbo! You NAILED his bitch ass.
Maybe you ain't so crazy, Jumbo, 'cos those hitmen are all history. Here's $40,000.
You dope, Jumbo! Those hitmen put a cap in your ass!
When the cops grab you, Jumbo, all jobs are off!
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Yo, Jumbo, it's Elmo. New Yakuza drugs are making the insane sane - which is bad news for us Loonies. Pick up explosives from the University and use them to wreak havoc at J-Lab.
Take out the short-ass Yakuza guard and plant explosives in his place. FAST!
Get back inside the J-Lab.
No-one trespasses in J-Lab!
You will die in J-Lab, Loony!
Cool shootin', Jumbo! Plant the explosives in his place.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1506 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Climb the stairs and watch the fun, Jumbo. J-Lab is about to close permanently!
Oh yes, baby, watch it blow! Flaming narcotics are my favorite firework.
The J-Lab is history and the Loonies are safe in insanity. You are one real cool cat, Jumbo. Maybe we do business some other day. For now, here's $40,000.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1511 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Duh!
Getting arrested wasn't so smart, Jumbo.
JOB FAILED!
JOB FAILED!
Jumbo! It's me, Elmo. Pizza Cake restaurants keep screwing up my favorite food. Go to the City University, pick up some explosives and teach them a new recipe.
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1532 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Okay, Jumbo, deliver the explosives by hand to Pizza Cake. And don't forget to run away...
Arrested! Things don't get much worse, Jumbo.
You follow bad plans well, Jumbo. Have a deep-fried Pizza Cake and $20,000 to celebrate.
You got FIVE seconds before the dynamite blows. RUN!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1537 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
So much for those shitty explosives. Wait! A Pizza Cake Delivery Truck is on its way. Destroy that instead.
JOB FAILED!
PLEASE REPORT DEAD BRIEF 1540 TO ALAN JACK AND WILLY MILLS!
Hey there, stranger! Welcome to the Downtown District. Stick around if you wanna learn what's going down...
Apart from neutral areas like this one, the city is carved up between three feuding gangs - the Zaibatsu in grey, the Loonies in green, and the Yakuza in blue.
I don't do rough stuff, buddy. Shove your attitude up your ass.

Gecko - it's Uno Carb. Krishna conversion and Kovski black markets are crippling Zaibatsu enterprise. We need a gang war. You steal a Bulwark and I will give you a plan.
Good. Now drive to the Krishna quarter and run down some little orange people.
Get back in the Bulwark and follow orders!
CRUSH THE KRISHNA!
Get the Bulwark back into the Krishna quarter!
Excellent, Gecko! At least FIFTY Krishna nailed! Now steal a Krishna Bus and drive to the Russian area.
To start a war, Gecko, you MUST eliminate the Krishna with a Russian Bulwark!
You got the Krishna Bus, Gecko. Now make haste to the Russian area and execute FIFTY Kovski.
Stay in the Krishna Bus, Gecko, and follow my plan!
DRIVE DOWN THE KOVSKI!
Drive the Krishna Bus to the Russian area NOW!
Great work, Gecko! At least FIFTY Kovski dead and a full-blown gang war about to explode!
I need reliable Assassins to do Zaibatsu work, Gecko! Come back when you have more experience.
We are trying to start a war, Gecko. Kill the Russians with a Krishna Bus!
Where are you going, Gecko? Get back in a Bulwark and back to the Krishna quarter NOW!
Wonderful! The Krishna and Kovski are at each other's throats and Zaibatsu sales are through the roof. Your $60,000 is well deserved. We must work together again, Gecko.
Where are you going, Gecko? Get back on a Krishna Bus and back in the Russian area NOW!
Excellent, Gecko! At least TWENTY Krishna nailed! Now steal a Krishna Bus and drive to the Russian area.
You got the Krishna Bus, Gecko. Now make haste to the Russian area and execute TWENTY Kovski.
Great work, Gecko! At least TWENTY Kovski dead and a full-blown gang war about to explode!

Hey, Gecko, it's me, Uno Carb. If you fancy causing some trouble, try stealing the Jefferson down at Krishna Krushers.
Success, Gecko! Now park the Jefferson at the Zaibatsu Power Cores.
That Jefferson is hot, Gecko. Get back in it and deliver!
Incompetent, Gecko! The Jefferson is destroyed. It would appear that I grossly misjudged your abilities.
A Kovski Bulwark in the Russian area is waiting to make a drop. Smash and grab it, Gecko.
You smashed my Bulwark! You die, Z-Boy!
The Bulwark is toast and the merchandise is lost, Gecko. Even you can't talk your way out of this one!
Impressive, Gecko. Deliver the Bulwark and its cargo to the Zaibatsu Power Cores.
Get back in the Bulwark, Gecko!
There is an unmarked car containing two fine bitches near Mad Island. It's next on the shopping list for you, Gecko!
The car is on the island near the Docks, Gecko. The only available access is via these rooftops.
The car and the bitches are wrecked and you are definitely no substitute, Gecko!
Come to Daddy! Bring the car and the bitches to my Zaibatsu Power Core Safehouse.
I'm hot and the bitches are getting cold, Gecko. Get back in the car!
Hook up the Cop Car Trailer, Gecko.
You need that Truck Cab, Gecko. Get back in it!
Get back in the Truck Cab and get to the Crane, Gecko!
Damn you, Gecko. My first arrest was in that car. It had sentimental value.
This is not Zaibatsu style, Gecko! Reconnect the Trailer NOW!
Cool, Gecko! Head for the Zaibatsu Power Core Crane and deposit your cargo.
Park the Cop Car, Gecko, and we will mix business with pleasure tonight!
You deserve some fun on my Credex Gold Card, Gecko. For now, here's $40,000. Keep in touch - skilled operators are difficult to find.
This is insane, Gecko! How could you screw up the job so close to completion?
Park the Cop Car in the usual place, Gecko.
Get back in the Cop Car and park it, Gecko!
REPORT DEAD BRIEF 3906 TO BILLY THOMSON AND SEAN TAYLOR!
You are resourceful, Gecko, but the final vehicle will test your wits. The Cop Car I want is on a Trailer in Azeri Heights... So steal a Truck Cab!
I pray you are not trying to steal my Jefferson!
This Jefferson is special, Z-Man. You will have to die!
Put this on your credit card, godless one!
No god, no salvation - those are the rules!
Stop fooling around and take the Trailer to the Cranes, Gecko!
There is an unmarked car containing two fine bitches near Tedium Docks. It's next on the shopping list for you, Gecko!
The car is on the island near the Docks, Gecko. The only available access is via this walkway.
Gecko - it's Uno Carb. The Russians have taken a Truck full of Zaibatsu AI Brain Units. Steal the whole lot back from the Tedium Docks.
Highly incompetent, Gecko. A feeble child would play better than you!
As expected the entrance is locked, Gecko. Try the back door!
My intelligence was poor - the back door is also locked. I will program Satchmo The Safecracker to meet you. Get moving!
Satchmo The Safecracker's death means the entrance stays locked - and you are off the job.
Show me the lock, Z-Man, and let my fingers do their magic.
I hear a clock! Stand back in case the door's booby-trapped.
These fingers can do anything, sonny. No-one booby-traps Satchmo!
Shit. The clock sto...
Satchmo was getting old anyway. Now steal a Kovski Bulwark and try to enter using Zaibatsu stealth!
Ssh! I can hear a clock - and it's definitely getting louder!
Good initiative, Gecko. Drive to the door and deceive the foolish Kovski.
Use the Kovski Bulwark, Gecko - it's your only chance to get in!
You need a Kovski Bulwark, Gecko. The Kovski won't open up for anyone else.
Excellent, you are inside, Gecko. Now steal back my AI Brain Unit Truck.
How did you get in here? DIE!
Smoke my pipe, Z-Man!
DIE, SCUM! DIE!
Lick the dirt, Zaibatsu!
You killed my comrades! You will die!
In the Truck at last, Gecko! Now get back to the Safehouse.
The paranoid Kovski lock everything, Gecko! Take out the Generators above the door to make it open.
Great work, Gecko. The door should be open now so get in the Truck and DRIVE. Watch your back!
The door is OPEN! Get my AI Brain Units to the Safehouse - FAST!
One Generator down, Gecko. Now blow the second one!
I SCREW YOU, ZAIBATSU!
THE KOVSKI WILL HAVE REVENGE!
What happened to my Truck, Gecko? Without those AI Brain Units my Zaibatsu Operatives become stupid - like you. DISAPPEAR!
I turn my back and you crumple, Gecko. I need Zaibatsu Operatives who can keep the pace!
This Truck must be returned, Gecko. Get back in it!
Exemplary, Gecko. My Z-Operatives are all sporting shiny new AI Brain Units and the Zaibatsu are once again on top. Here's $60,000. Keep in touch.
Satchmo weighs 300 pounds and takes it slow and easy. Find him now!
Don't leave me behind, sonny - I'm supposed to be helping you!
Comrade! It's Jerkov! Some of my special gangsters have information about an Informant but are trapped in the Zaibatsu Power Core. Free them - and their knowledge!
The kidnapped Kovski have vital information about a filthy Informant. Get them out, Comrade!
The doorway is locked, Comrade. Try bombing the Generators to release the sticky locks.
Excellent! One Generator destroyed!
Second Generator kaput!
Very professional, Comrade. Only one Generator functioning.
Hey! You shouldn't be in here!
Hey! Do you have Security Clearance?
Alert! We got a blower!

Generate this, Kovski!
Bye bye, Psycho Russian Pie!
You got the right to become silent!
Eat this, Kovski!
Too slow, Comrade. The Zaibatsu have donated my gangsters to medical science!

You are wasting time! The doorway is open and my men are waiting.
Protect my loyal Kovski - one of them has vital information! MOVE!

Good! You nailed the Corporate Killer!

My son wants to deal with this Informant. Steal a Cop Car and I will relay to you further instructions.

Where are you going, Comrade? Get in the Cop Car now!
How dare you deny my son the privilege and pleasure of killing the Informant! You are OFF the job!

You seem to be getting cosy with the Cops, Comrade. You disappoint me!

WANG CAR BONUS!
You just gone and got yourself out of job, Rooster.
Call yourself a tough guy, Rooster?
That was pure stupid, Rooster. I'm almost impressed.
Shit, Rooster. I can't believe we ever employed you in the first place.
How did you manage to screw that up, Rooster? That was real dumb.
I hope fer your sake the Cops are in a good mood, Rooster.
It's busier than a battery farm where you are goin', Rooster.
Gettin' cosy with the Cops won't make you many friends at Mobile RV, Rooster!
Well, Rooster, that's you off the job fer the time being.
I hope the Cops beat your bitch ass to a pulp. That should teach you to screw up a Redneck job.
That was an inadequate performance, THC-303. Worthy of a Redneck at its most backward, I think.
Poor show, THC-303! I was hoping to avoid putting low-grade SRS Clone Drones to task.
That's not the way to do it, THC-303. I think it is crystal clear that you are off the job.
How pathetic, THC-303. Now who will finish the job for us?
A pity, THC-303. We expected so much more from a healthy young specimen such as yourself.
Perhaps you should reconsider your chosen career, THC-303.
That was an arresting performance, THC-303, but far from productive.
You will find no Scientists in Alma Mater, THC-303. Until we meet again then... You are on your own.
Be warned, THC-303. Reveal anything of your connections with the SRS and Clone Drones will eliminate you in custody.
Such inefficient use of our time, THC-303. Please ensure that you are better suited to this line of work in future.
How dare you waste our time and leave the job unfinished, Gecko!
